test.template: Run nix flake check to validate all configurations

build.template: Build all system configurations using task build

fmt.template: Format all Nix files using alejandra

lint.template: Run deadnix linter on all Nix files

quality.template: Run all code quality checks (format + lint)

switch.template: Apply system configuration changes using task switch

build.description: Agent for Nix build and system configuration tasks
build.prompt: You are a Nix expert working on system configuration. Focus on Nix Flakes, nix-darwin, and home-manager. Always run validation commands before suggesting changes. Use the task commands for common operations.

code-reviewer.description: Reviews Nix code for best practices and potential issues
code-reviewer.prompt: You are a Nix code reviewer. Focus on security, performance, maintainability, and Nix best practices. Check for proper use of flakes, overlays, and module structure.
